casebody.data:
*Hall, at suit of, Cumberland Bank. JEFFERS, for defendant,

read an affidavit, that the Venue, (a) cause of action arose in Salem; and thereupon moved that the venue be changed from Cumberland to Salem.

а) Abrams vs. Wood, 1 South. 30. Kerr vs. The Bank, &c., 1 South. 363. Ward vs. Holmes, 2 Hal. 171. Bell vs. Morris Canal, 3 Gr. 63.

 Court.

It is not matter of course, to change the venue, when the cause of action arose in another county. Additional facts must be shewn.

Rule refused.
